snippet.title: Jazon and the Dead - Reveal Trailer - Fig Crowdfunding Campaign 2016
snippet.description:
Fig Campaign: https://www.fig.co/campaigns/jazon-and-the-dead

Follow on social networks:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/2ndStudioAnimation
Twitter: https://twitter.com/2ndStudioAni
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/2ndstudio
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/2ndStudioAnimation
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/2nd.studio/

Credits:
Game Design:
Nikki Starostka
Dennis Jensen

Graphics:
Nikki Starostka
Dennis Jensen

Programming:
Kasper Færch Mikkelsen

Music Composer:
Johnny Knittle

Game Writer:
Michael Valuer

Additional Graphics:
Bernardo Bordeira
Mikkel Brøns-Frandsen
Thomas Margaard Sørensen

Additional Concept Art:
Pietro Guglielmi
Otto Moesgård Jørgensen

Additional Animation:
Dorte Jensen
Diego de Paula
Jeppe Broo Døcker
Steffen Christensen
Kenneth Ladekjær
Niels Andersen Dolmer
Mikkel Mainz Elkjaer
Bo Juhl Nielsen
Helena Smith

Additional Programming:
Hans Peter Framvig Kyhl
Matt Barr
Joshua Long

Voices:
Jazon - Elijah Lucian
Zoey - Kaela Caron
Computer Voice - Taylor Kaye

Special thanks to:
Rasmus Folsø Jensen
Adonis Maigaard Flokiou
Emil Kjær
Michael Kirketerp Tastesen
Joel Dreskin
Khahil White
Jonathan Chan
And the rest of Fig.co
FortySeven
Friends and family
